subject: Suits and Litigation
Sexual Harassment
Basketball
lead_paragraph: A season-ticket holder testified that he heard Isiah Thomas speak of Anucha Browne Sanders in terms she said were quite familiar to her and that made her increasingly uncomfortable.
snippet: A season-ticket holder testified that he heard Isiah Thomas speak of Anucha Browne Sanders in terms she said were quite familiar to her and that made her increasingly uncomfortable.
